sentences.en: "Daring Adventures" from '86 is a far more cohesive and successful album.
sentences.cn: 1986年发行的《勇于冒险》是一张风格更为统一也更为成功的专辑。

sentences.en: Ability to motivate restaurant staff and maintain a cohesive team.
sentences.cn: 能够激励餐厅员工并团结大家,使团队具有凝聚力.

sentences.en: All company employees, the implementation of a remarkable, cohesive and enterprising spirit.
sentences.cn: 公司所有员工, 有着非凡的执行力 、 凝聚力和进取精神.

sentences.en: For highly cohesive sediment, the critical tractive force becomes less significant.
sentences.cn: 对于高粘性泥沙, 临界推移力就成为不重要的.

sentences.en: He skillfully fuses these fragments into a cohesive whole.
sentences.cn: 他巧妙地把这些片断合并成连贯的整体.

sentences.en: Only the thermosetting resins provide a strong cohesive forces; this is due to molecular cross linkages.
sentences.cn: 只有热固性树脂具有巨大的凝聚力, 这是由于分子交错链所造成的.

sentences.en: She sealed the parcel with cohesive tape.
sentences.cn: 她用粘胶带把包裹封起来。

sentences.en: Systematizing a vast assortment of rules into a cohesive whole.
sentences.cn: 把大堆杂乱的规则系统整理成连贯的整体.

sentences.en: the cohesive power of shared suffering
The two sentences are bound together by a cohesive tie.
sentences.cn: 这两个句子通过关联词被结合在了一起.

sentences.en: They do not see themselves as a cohesive group.
sentences.cn: 他们不认为他们自己是有凝聚力的一群.

sentences.en: This direct - to - video feature re - edits the three Godfather films into one cohesive package.
sentences.cn: 本影片将三部教父重新编辑为一部影片.

sentences.en: With the retreat of this boundary the cohesive bonds gradually yield.
sentences.cn: 随着这种边界的后退,凝聚性结合逐渐屈服.

sentences.en: Wolves'cohesive power, group spirit and training is key to their life.
sentences.cn: 狼群的凝聚力 、 团队精神和训练成为决定它们生死存亡的决定性因素.

sentences.en: Won people consequently, establish the core position of ethical cohesive affinity.
sentences.cn: 因而赢得了人民, 确立了民族凝聚力的核心地位.

words.tran_cn: 凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力
有结合力的；紧密结合的；有粘着力的

trans.tran_cn: 统一的，团结的，使结合的
trans.tran_en: connected or related in a reasonable way to form a whole
